description: [NASADEM](https://earthdata.nasa.gov/esds/competitive-programs/measures/nasadem) provides global topographic data at 1 arc-second (~30m) horizontal resolution, derived primarily from data captured via the [Shuttle Radar Topography Mission](https://www2.jpl.nasa.gov/srtm/) (SRTM).
title: NASADEM HGT v001
